comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, LionsSlots7777. I have examined your casino website, and I have some feedback for you. First of all, I noticed that your Terms of Service are copy-pasted from another site. This is not a good idea, because it suggests that you don‚Äôt take your business seriously and aren‚Äôt willing to put in the effort required to be a successful casino operator. You should change this, because it looks unprofessional and could lead to legal issues down the road. I would recommend that you either write your own Terms of Service or hire someone else to do so for you Also, your website design is very bland and boring. It doesn't stand out from any other casino website that I have seen before, and it looks like you used a ready-made casino script without any customization. This is not a good idea because it makes you look unprofessional and untrustworthy. This is why I don't think that your casino will be successful in the long run. You should consider changing the design of your website, and I recommend that you hire a web designer for this purpose. Anyway, that's my honest opinion. I hope that you will take it into consideration.

comments.body: This looks more of an announcement than an advertisement. Very poor setup coupled with poor information. Seems your site is not responding as at the time of my commenting. This looks and seems sketchy. I would stay very afar while watching this casino platform. Do well to get a copper account so you could get a broader range in advertising and publicity. With this you have done, I do not think you will get any attention as required because I see nothing here which you have done. Go work on your website and update this thread with your latest input so you could get your traffic or nothing else. Meanwhile I hope you are genuine as there are lots of comments pointing towards your reliability and credibility. Do you have license to operate as a casino platform.My humble advise is that you go back to your table and draw your map properly before embarking on your journey so you do not get missing half way.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on December 01, 2022, 11:51:42 PMQuote from: Cryptolottery.BET on December 01, 2022, 11:42:11 PMThank you for your comment notblox1, I guess that you knew Cryptoloto.BET and that you have examples of "scams" by Cryptolottery.BET?You created self moderated topic so I don't want to talk with you there, but it's strange that you are following other topics in forum created in similar time If you check my topic for Casinos and Sportbooks to Avoid, you will see many scam casinos that use same template like you and¬† LionSlots777:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5283832.0Right now the only bad feedback is having the same script as all the other casinos with scam accusations, it's hard for a new casino to open with already bad feedback on something that they might not be aware of, maybe it's an honest mistake on their part but right now it's a hard climb to prove that they are serious in establishing a competitive casino, this is a lesson for those starting out a casino business, do a feasibility study first, check what will make your casino get good feedback and what could possibly go wrong.
